alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 8:11PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake and northwestern Orange Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tavares, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Eustis, Tavares, Mount Dora, and Howey-In-the-hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County
